Row.Text: [COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]Bonded[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]Workers are bound to the land they serve.{1_Opinions}----------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bonuses:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_WORKER] Build Charges. [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Penalties:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Civilian Unit Production. [NEWLINE]----------
+1 [ICON_WORKER] Build Charges.

[COLOR_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY]Emancipated[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE]Workers are free to sell their labour.{1_Opinions}----------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bonuses:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Civilian Unit Production. [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Penalties:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]----------[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]-1 [ICON_WORKER] Build Charges. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Disables Slave Workers. [NEWLINE]----------
-1 [ICON_WORKER] Build Charges. Disables Slave Workers.
Hold {1_Name} Ceremony

In celebration of our auspicious ascension, we propose a ceremony, to which all citizens and subjects are welcome! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Government. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 {3_ResourceDesc}. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each city that you control.[ENDCOLOR]

In celebration of our auspicious ascension, we propose a ceremony, to which all citizens and subjects are welcome! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with each city that you control.[ENDCOLOR]
{1_PlayerName} has held their {2_CeremonyName} Ceremony to mark their assumption of rule over the {3_CivName}.
Exercise Royal Prerogative

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, the Royal Prerogative must be exercised for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be a Monarchy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Legislature. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Current [ICON_JFD_REFORM_COOLDOWN] Reform Cooldown is reduced by 50%.

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, the Royal Prerogative must be exercised for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Current [ICON_JFD_REFORM_COOLDOWN] Reform Cooldown is reduced by 50%.
Invoke Reserve Powers

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the ruler must take immediate action. In these times, the Reserve Powers must be invoked for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be a Republic. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Legislature. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A new [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called.

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the ruler must take immediate action. In these times, the Reserve Powers must be invoked for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]A new [ICON_JFD_VOTE] Election is called.
Issue Holy Decree

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, a Holy Decree must be issued for the good of the faith. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be a Theocracy. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Legislature. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+{1_Num} [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50 [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety for all civilizations following your State Religion. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: the [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety reward that you receive increases for every Civilization following your State Religion.[ENDCOLOR]

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, a Holy Decree must be issued for the good of the faith. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50 [ICON_JFD_PIETY] Piety for all civilizations following your State Religion.
Issue Papal Bull
Revoke the Holy Roman Empire

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that a system is not fit to serve its purpose. In these times, the Emperor must give up his duties and surrender the Holy Roman Empire. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be the Holy Roman Empire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Legislature. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows you to switch Government for free. [ICON_BULLET]+{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Note: the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture reward that you receive is based upon the Culture Per Turn of every Befriended City-State.[ENDCOLOR]

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that a system is not fit to serve its purpose. In these times, the Emperor must give up his duties and surrender the Holy Roman Empire. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Allows you to switch Government for free. [ICON_BULLET]Lump sum of [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Purge Enemies of the State

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, the state's enemies must be purged for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be a Dictatorship. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have a Legislature. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per era. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy is set to 0. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance is set to 0.

There are times, in spite of the will of government, that the sovereign must take immediate action. In these times, the state's enemies must be purged for the good of the nation. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RESISTANCE] Anarchy is set to 0. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance is set to 0.
